title: WTB: T206 White Sox with Piedmont 350 back
author: ChiSoxFan

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 White Sox with Piedmont 350 back
posts.post_content:
Greetings,

I'm working on a T206 Piedmont 350 White Sox team set. I'm down to needing the card listed below. Looking for cards around Good condition. Prefer SGC graded, but will also consider PSA or Beckett graded. Will also consider Raw cards.

Looking For:
  * Jake Atz
  * Bill Burns
  * George Davis (HOF)
  * Jiggs Donohue
  * Patsy Dougherty (Arm In Air)
  * Patsy Dougherty (Portrait)
  * Lou Fiene (Portrait)
  * Lou Fiene (Throwing)
  * Ed Hahn
  * Frank Isbell
  * Fielder Jones (Hands At Hip)
  * Frank Owen
  * Fred Parent
  * Frank Smith (F. Smith on Front)
  * Frank Smith (White Cap)
  * Ed Walsh (HOF)
  * Doc White (Pitching)
  * Doc White (Portrait)


Pending Deals:
  * None


Incoming Cards:
  * None




Please PM offers.


Thanks,
James

I have 2 beautiful SGCs of Parent & Jones.

Sending PM
